author: chfast
content:
cc <@689161464829050960> <@543900561460822016> <@892053833121923094> 

More background: so far we were able to get away from taking RLP as an input so we don't need any RLP decoding. Not a big achievement, but still it feels nice to use only JSON for tool communication. Also, it plays nicer with possible future transition to SSZ.

author: chfast
content: E.g. retesteth/t8n has an option to deliver transactions as an JSON array.
